title: Bloomberg Markets: Aguilar on Investing Internationally
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Aguilar on Investing Internationally
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Omar Aguilar Chief Investment Officer of Equities Charles Schwab Investment Management Discussing seeing tailwinds in international equities and the Schwab International Equity ETF (SCHF).

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
